channel.title: Project Insanity Dropping
channel.description: In my DropItem Class, I need to add [code=java] Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, itemId, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.playerItemsN[slot], c.getId()); [/code] To make the items show up on the ground. Anyone know specifically where I should add that?

item.title: Project Insanity Dropping
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

In my DropItem Class, I need to add

Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, itemId, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.playerItemsN[slot], c.getId());

To make the items show up on the ground. Anyone know specifically where I should add that?

Read full topic
